publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4938 Richard Baker: The Success of the Scottish Football Teamâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Walter Smith and the Scottish football team on their famous 1-0 victory over France at Hampden Park on Saturday 6 October 2006; recognises that this was an historic victory; further recognises that this was the latest excellent result in a sustained period of improvement for the Scottish national team, and wishes the team the very best in its efforts to qualify for the European Football Championship in 2008. Supported by: Mr Charlie Gordon*, Paul Martin*, Margaret Smith*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Sarah Boyack*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Bill Aitken*, Bill Butler*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Pauline McNeill*, Scott Barrie*, Maureen Macmillan*, Bristow Muldoon*, Karen Gillon*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4938 The Success of the Scottish Football Team (lodged on 10 October 2006) Cathie Craigie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Trish Godman*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4938 The Success of the Scottish Football Team (lodged on 10 October 2006) Dennis Canavan*
